pullrequest.title: Apply gamma correction when Scene3D engine is set to ogre2

content.raw:
I have not seen a crash yet. Could you check `~/.ignition/rendering/ogre2.log` and see if there are any errors / exceptions. The black background is expected as setting background color is not working yet. To see something in the scene, you could try out ign-gazebo’s shapes.sdf world

You could also see if you can run the [ogre2\_demo](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/src/gz11/examples/ogre2_demo/) in ign-rendering to verify that ogre2 plugin is working properly
content.html:
I have not seen a crash yet. Could you check ~/.ignition/rendering/ogre2.log and see if there are any errors / exceptions. The black background is expected as setting background color is not working yet. To see something in the scene, you could try out ign-gazebo’s shapes.sdf world

You could also see if you can run the ogre2_demo in ign-rendering to verify that ogre2 plugin is working properly
